attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WHY SHOULD ANY MP'S HAVE EXPENSES, ALL US 'REGULAR' WORKERS HAVE TO PAY OUR OWN WAY SO WHY SHOULD'NT THEY. THE ONLY PEOPLE THAT ARE DRAGGING OUR COUNTRY DOWN ARE OUR OWN SO CALL 'LEADERS' AND THE SPONGERS OF OUR BENEFITS.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
